author: Charlie Bruce
comment: Can't change color as promised

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
Which color? For additional question,
Please feel free to contact our email address.
Thank you.

author: Sascha Ferda
comment: Takes too long to draw and refresh.  Must improve performance
title: Too slow

author: Shawn Bahuaud
comment: Nice Design and great layout but won't auto update when I switch time zones .  You have to resync the watch
title: Nice design but I have to restart my watch to update time zone

author: Scott Bird
comment: Your faces are some of the best out there but weather info on all of them is completely inaccurate

author: george schafer
comment: I love this app
title: Super cool!

author: Randall
comment: Arguably one of the best watch faces for the Moto 360. However, the battery drain while using it makes it practically useless unless you plan to bring a charger and charge twice every day.
title: Good except for the battery drain

author: Leo Green
comment: I love this watch face, but the older version 8 the battery like crazy. They've had an update, and it is normal battery usage now.
title: that's much better after update!

author: William Everich
comment: I absolutely love the look of this watchface. In Magenta or Yellow, Lime.. it always looks great. Unfortunately battery life is literally half of what I get with any other watchface.
title: Awesome face that pummels your battery

author: James Baird
comment: I love all the info on this watch face and it looks great too!  Seems to drain the battery quicker than other watch faces or maybe its because I just can't stop looking at it. No current temp displayed.
title: A favorite

author: Dia Dipasupil
comment: Nice design. However, it would be helpful to see the current temperature and the seconds when in Black-and-White mode. Seconds only display when in the Default mode (green background). Overall, I love all the data on the screen.
title: Lots of Info!

author: shrihara Palanetra
comment: Sunrise and sunset timings are not accurate for manually set location
title: Looks amazing

author: Azat Salikhov
comment: It's one of my favorites as it provides a lot of info I want in a very cool UI. I wish it would allow to change colors of the UI through the phone app. Good job!
title: Great Watchface!

author: Gabriel Armstrong
comment: Battery drianer big time.

author: Ben Orchard
comment: Nice watch face overall, but somehow I missed that there is no current temperature. Very important given how much data there is on this face. Brightness controls in the watch face 'fight' with the Moto360 settings, so it can get a bit disco at times. The dark face is pointless, it only flashes randomly. Nice when you see it, but it would be better if you could set it to show at night (to protect your night vision - this is a very bright watch face). Love the data, but the fonts, brightness issues and so on make this a tough keeper.
title: No current temperature.

author: Tim.F. Zhang
comment: The black and white mode looks subtle and is probably better used for when I'm at work, in a meeting etc, but it has really jagged edges on fonts and graphics. Is it possible that we can have a colour mode that's exactly the same with the black on green scheme but is white on black??
title: Like it a lot but can we have better black and white mode?

author: Robert George
comment: I am a weather geek so I like all the info on the dial. Would like more color and contrast choices, but still love it.
title: Cool

author: Ralph McCoy
comment: Can you input an opition to change the text color to white, that may help with super low brightness on the blue and red.
title: Great!

author: Peter B
comment: I just wish the blue and red colors were as bright as on A06 face. They seem very dim in this one. Thanks !
title: Another excellent face

author: Bonikane Chanbonpin
comment: Maybe u could also give options to customize the background with other colors instead of making it green only.. Please add orange ... It also froze a couple of times and eats a lot of battery. But I love this watch face.. Hope it gets fixed soon.

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback.I've updated the app.Would you please update.

title: Love it!

author: udi levy
comment: Can you change the date format ?

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
I've updated and added the option of date format.
Please check the latest version of this face.
Thank you.

author: Chris Edwards
comment: I've noticed some of the fonts, Like the battery percentage and the forecast temperature, get squished together. especially 88 or 98 degree

reply.author: Smartwatch Bureaux
reply.content:
Thank you for your feedback.
I've updated the app for overlapping percentage mark.
Please check the latest version.

title: Love it, but the fonts are kinda squished.

author: James Quisenberry
comment: Nice retro/LCD design that reminds me of some of the watches from the 80s and 90s.  As others have noted, it is missing the current temperature.  I prefer the black & white mode, but the settings are somewhat convoluted and getting there is a challenge.  Some additional colors for both background in color mode and foreground for B&W mode would be nice.  A red background for low light would be nice to preserve night vision.    I would love to use this face, but when it is installed on my watch, it goes through about 1/4 of the battery every 2-3 hours.  Tweaking the update settings help a little, but not much.  The design and look of this face is 4 star quality, but until the battery drain is improved, I have to give it only 2.
title: Sharp design, but has issues
